title: Thankyou, and sorry
body:
Thankyou so much Riot for permanently banning me. I really did enjoy playing this game, and I understand that arguing in text chat and flaming is a bad offence. I guess this is what I get for spending thousands of hours and dollars on a game. If only I knew that my excessive love and passion for league would get me banned. 

And once again, sorry fellow community for being so negative and disrespectful.
Adieu
